emptyList: You don't have any gift yet ! If you received a code by email, click on the button above.

fields.name: Name
fields.emptyMedia: No media planned for this day

help.text1: On this page, you'll be able to create and customize your gifts.
help.text2: Each gift's price is calculated based on the amount of memories and receivers.
help.text3: When you send a gift, its addressees receive an email with an invitation to claim it.
help.text4: You'll receive a confirmation email when they claim the gift on the site.

receiver.noMediaToday: Oops, it seems there are no gift for you today !

mediaObject.title: Title
mediaObject.nsfwNotice: This media seems to be not safe for work. Confirm that you want to see it now ?

recap.nonApplicableVat: Non applicable VAT according to article 293-B of CGI

name.label: I want to create a gift named

fillingMethod.label: I want to plan the distribution

help.title: Help
help.manual: In <0>manual mode</0>, for each day of your gift you'll have to associate a media.
help.automatic: In <0>automatic mode</0>, we will use your current libraries to plan your image, then you can modify them. If you have no libraries it will do nothing.

token.label: Code
token.placeholder: The code you received by email
token.error: Code must be a 6 digit number.
token.errorNotFound: You entered a wrong code or your email is different from the one that received the code.

creatorNickname.label: Your nickname (it will help your receiver understanding who sent the gift)

comment.label: Note
comment.placeholder: Some kind words, a joke, anything you want to say before the person receives your awesome gift.

comment.label: Comment
comment.placeholder: Those were the best holidays ever for me !
